title: The cheapskate’s guide to digital entertainment
description: Subscriptions to Netflix, Amazon Prime, and probably Spotify are getting more expensive. Here's where to find amazing free or cheap-(ish) alternatives.

title: At Cannes Film Festival, TikTok is inescapable
description: TikTok's Chinese ownership may dominate conversation in Washington. At Cannes, its influence is undeniable.

title: Brazilian lawmakers file complaint against Google for ‘Slavery Simulator’ game
description: A game available on Google Play had users sell, buy and punish enslaved people. Now, it's at the center of a federal probe in Brazil.

title: Elon Musk’s brain-chip company Neuralink gets FDA approval: what to know
description: Neuralink said it has regulatory approval to conduct a clinical trial of its brain implants in people, a milestone for the company as it seeks to commercialize a device that will link human brains to computers.
